parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.78

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The enemy [[Side|side]] (used for renegades). Unit of this side is enemy to everyone.
<br>To become one, you can attack members of your own side or use [[addRating]].
<br>When below a [[rating]] of -2000 units switch automatically to this side.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sideEnemy'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[side]] [[player]] == [[sideEnemy]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "We've got a renegade!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addRating]], [[rating]], [[Side]], [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideLogic]], [[sideFriendly]], [[sideUnknown]], [[playerSide]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[Side relations]]
</value></part></template>
